mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (noticeno, topview, memberno, title, content, cnt, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1) VALUES (notice_seq.nextval, #{topview}, #{memberno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{cnt}, #{word}, sysdate, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1})
mapper.select: SELECT noticeno, topview, memberno, title, content, cnt, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM notice ORDER BY noticeno DESC
